title: Oceanfront Suite
description: Indulge in luxury with our Oceanfront Suite. This spacious 800 sq. ft. suite offers breathtaking ocean views, a private balcony, and elegant furnishings. Perfect for a romantic getaway or a special occasion.
bookingpolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in.

title: Mountain View Retreat
description: Escape to nature in our Mountain View Retreat. This 1200 sq. ft. cabin offers panoramic mountain views, a cozy fireplace, and a rustic ambiance. Ideal for a family retreat or a peaceful mountain getaway.
bookingpolicy: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before check-in.

title: Cityscape Loft
description: Immerse yourself in city living with our Cityscape Loft. This 1000 sq. ft. loft features modern design, city views, and a central location. Perfect for those who love the vibrancy of urban life.
bookingpolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in.

title: Lakefront Chalet
description: Experience lakeside serenity in our Lakefront Chalet. This spacious 1600 sq. ft. chalet offers stunning lake views, a private dock, and a tranquil atmosphere. Perfect for a family vacation or a group retreat.
bookingpolicy: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before check-in.

title: Sky High Penthouse
description: Reach new heights of luxury in our Sky High Penthouse. This expansive 2500 sq. ft. penthouse features floor-to-ceiling windows, a private terrace, and unparalleled city skyline views. Ideal for a sophisticated urban escape.
bookingpolicy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before check-in.

title: Coastal Cottage Escape
description: Escape to coastal charm in our Coastal Cottage Escape. This 1400 sq. ft. beach cottage offers a relaxing coastal view, direct beach access, and a laid-back atmosphere. Perfect for a family beach vacation or a romantic coastal retreat.
bookingpolicy: Free cancellation up to 72 hours before check-in.
